data.text:
The Sovereign Order is an Ecumenical Christian Order, focused on the traditions of helping the sick and the poor and maintaining more than 900 years of tradition.

The Mission Statement of the Sovereign Order includes in the first point “to create and deliver to the fullest extent…the benefits that can be developed for the Lord’s sick and poor”.

Since around 1050, the Sovereign Order has focused on aiding the sick and the poor and developing methods to improve mortality and patient care.
